explanation: To prove whether check_param__epoll is (directly or indirectly) recursive we must follow its call graph along callee edges. check_param__epoll calls exactly one external function: MHD_is_feature_supported. Therefore MHD_is_feature_supported is required so the analyzer can determine whether that function (or any function it calls) can reach back to check_param__epoll. No other symbols are required: the global tool_params.epoll is irrelevant to recursion, and the provided static graph shows MHD_is_feature_supported has no further callees (so no cycle is possible).
